data: Karena Anda tidak memenuhi persyaratan umur yang diperlukan untuk login dengan akun tipe ini, sesuai Ketentuan Layanan, akun Anda akan dihapus. Jika Anda yakin memenuhi persyaratan untuk login menggunakan akun tipe ini, silakan hubungi kami.

Dengan melakukan fusi dengan Solgaleo atau Lunala, Necrozma dapat berganti wujud menjadi Necrozma Surai Senja atau Necrozma Sayap Fajar.
Isn’t this mystical site something, %PLAYERNAME%? These ruins abound with mysteries AND Pokémon.
Many Trainers report feeling like they’re being watched, as if invisible guardians are keeping this sacred place safe. And they might be right!
Last time I visited, I WAS being watched—by a curious Sableye!
Keep your eyes peeled. This temple has attracted Pokémon for a long time—what will you discover?
Welcome to the festivi-teas, %PLAYERNAME%! Take a load off and sip your worries away.
I just love the atmosphere—all soothing aromas and floral notes. Ah... Time feels as if it’s slowing down.
Spend long enough here and you’ll likely be napping like a Snorlax. One might even say you’ll become...Snor-laxed! Haha!
Ahem, well—pour yourself a cup of adventure and explore!
Step right up, %PLAYERNAME%! Wonder and excitement are the main attractions! Welcome to the carnival!
The atmosphere here reminds me of cotton candy—sweet, colorful, and guaranteed to make you smile.
Just make sure your ice cream cone isn’t a smiling Vanillite!
It’s time to gear up for adventure, %PLAYERNAME%! Even the air seems engineered for extraordinary encounters.
Do you feel the rhythmic pulsing all around us? Hm...it’s not quite natural, but somehow deeply organic. It’s like we’re standing at the crossroads of ancient wisdom and future potential.
Just like the parts of a well-oiled machine, each Pokémon helps make this habitat unique. Speaking of, look out for crossing Klink!
Time to set your gears in motion and discover what mechanical marvels await!
Okay, I’ve got just the voice for this... Valiant Trainer! These noble fields call forth the hero that dwells within us all!
There’s a splendor here that awakens the grandest parts of one’s spirit.
Witness these remarkable Pokémon! Behold the brave Galarian Farfetch’d, who wields a thick, tough leek in battle!
Venture forth with courage, %PLAYERNAME%—the honorable Pokémon of these grounds await your challenge!
Great to see you, %PLAYERNAME%! I’m feeling like legends are afoot with so many talented Trainers and Pokémon in one place.
With things so busy, I’ve picked up some interesting stories. Get a load of this!
Multiple witnesses have reported Pokémon that sound a lot like—wait for it—Zacian and Zamazenta!
These mighty Warrior Pokémon achieved legendary feats in their time, so you’d better believe I’m excited to dig into this!
Which of the two piques your interest?
Right, let's go on the defensive! Let me recall my notes on Zamazenta..
A bold approach. You’re right—now’s the time to strike! Let me see what notes I have on Zacian...
In times past, Zamazenta worked together with a king of the people to save the Galar region.
Here we are. Known as a legendary hero, this Pokémon absorbs metal particles, transforming them into a weapon it uses to battle.
A noble feat! From what, I wonder? Perhaps a question for another day.
Very impressive. I wonder if Zacian could teach my Meltan how to do that.
Let's work on finding Zamazenta first. Take a look around and let me know what you find!
But I’m jumping ahead of myself! Let’s find Zacian first. If we split up to search, we can go twice as fast. See you in a bit!
There you are, %PLAYERNAME%! No sign of Zamazenta for me, though I did find some new information on it.
There you are, %PLAYERNAME%! No Zacian sightings for me, though I did find some new information.
This Pokémon slept for aeons while in the form of a statue. It was asleep for so long people forgot that it ever existed.
Supposedly, Zacian slumbered for many years. Some say it’s Zamazenta’s elder sister, but others say the two are rivals. What do you think?
Well, I can relate. I like a restorative afternoon nap myself. And if you ask Meltan, it would probably tell you I sleep like a statue.
Well, who’s to say they can’t be both? Haha!
Anyway, Zamazenta won't be forgotten for much longer. I've got a good feeling!
Either way, nobody finds anything without looking. Chaaaaarge!
Splendid, you've found Zamazenta! It is certainly a sight to behold.
Magnificent! You’ve found Zacian! Goodness, it truly “steels” the show.
Can you believe it has another impressive form as well? With its shield Zamazenta transforms into its Crowned Shield Form.
Can you believe it has another impressive form as well? When armed with the weapon it used in ancient times, Zacian transforms into its Crowned Sword form.
In this form it can shrug off impressive blows, including the attacks of Dynamax Pokémon.
I’ve heard that in that form, it can fell even Gigantamax Pokémon with a single strike. I don’t know if I believe that!
I'm sure such incredible defensive power will give you a solid advantage in a Max Battle soon!
But either way, I’m sure such incredible power will give you the edge in your next Max Battle!
%PLAYERNAME%! I've been thinking about Zamazenta and its Crowned Shield Form.
%PLAYERNAME%! I’ve been learning more about Zacian and its Crowned Sword form.
Its ability to deflect any attack led to it being known as the Fighting Master's Shield.
According to my research, it became known as the Fairy King’s Sword, inspiring awe in friend and foe alike.
I'd be keen to observe it in a Max Battle, if you're up for it.
I’m not sure I understand the first part, but the second seems true enough! I’m keen to observe it in a Max Battle, if you’re up for it.
That's the spirit! Ready when you are!
That’s the spirit! Ready when you are!
Phenomenal work! What an honor to observe such a riveting Max Battle with your Crowned Shield Zamazenta.
Just phenomenal! What an honor to witness your Crowned Sword Zacian in such a riveting Max Battle.
I've never seen such an incredible display of defensive skill. You two can certainly hold your own against Dynamax Pokémon.
I feel empowered! I feel...RARGH!!! …Ahem. Maybe I’ll leave the battle cries to the Pokémon.
Whatever challenges may come your way in the future, I know you and Zamazenta can take on anything together.
Whatever challenges may come your way, I know you and Zacian can handle them together.
Hello there, %PLAYERNAME%! What an exciting day we have ahead of us.
Isn’t there something heartwarming about watching Trainers catch new Pokémon and make new friends?
But I’ve noticed something curious—a strange fog is rolling in. While I’m not sure what this phenomenon means yet, it certainly warrants investigation.
So let’s get to it! Have fun exploring, and we’ll reconvene later to discuss our findings.
Welcome back! I’ve been monitoring that mysterious fog. There are no updates, but I discovered something quite fascinating!
Pokémon seem to be gathering around four distinct habitats, each with its own unique characteristics.
I've observed Wooloo frolicking in local fields, Basculin with red and blue stripes swimming around an underwater trove, and even a Heracross running around a nearby carnival.
There’s also a fourth habitat that I haven’t had the chance to explore yet!
Where will your research take you first? The choice is yours, %PLAYERNAME%!
Impressive work on that first habitat! Point us toward our next discovery, %PLAYERNAME%!
Another habitat successfully investigated! Where to next, %PLAYERNAME%?
Remarkable work, %PLAYERNAME%! Only one more habitat left to explore.
Well done, %PLAYERNAME%! After analyzing the mysterious fog, I’ve found evidence suggesting a mythic presence—the Steam Pokémon, Volcanion.
I was going over my notes right before you arrived. Did you know that Volcanion harnesses water to create steam?
To learn more about this elusive Pokémon, I’d like you to dive into studying other Water types.
See what you can learn about their internal water reservoirs or temperature regulation. Each observation brings us one step closer to Volcanion!
Incredible progress with your soggy survey! Now let’s turn our attention to Fire-type Pokémon.
Since Volcanion is currently the only known Pokémon that is both Fire- and Water-type, understanding how it manages these opposing elements is crucial.
I’d like you to turn up the heat on observing Fire types in their natural habitats. Pay close attention to what mechanisms they use to prevent overheating.
This will help us to better understand Volcanion’s remarkable dual typing. Your fieldwork continues to be essential, %PLAYERNAME%!
Amazing discoveries, %PLAYERNAME%! Your research on both Water and Fire types gives us a clearer understanding of how Volcanion might behave in the wild.
Our next challenge is perhaps the most important yet— we need to show Volcanion that you’re a trustworthy Trainer. Let’s focus on demonstrating your exceptional care for Pokémon!
When Volcanion witnesses the kindness and respect you show to your Pokémon companions, it will surely recognize the goodness in your heart.
Your gentle approach could make all the difference in our ability to encounter this elusive Pokémon!
Phenomenal job as always! Your patience, dedication, and kind heart have accomplished what many thought impossible—you’ve gained Volcanion’s trust!
I encourage you to spend quality time with this Mythical Pokémon. Grow that special bond that only comes from understanding and respecting each other.
This journey has expanded our understanding of Pokémon. The connection between Trainers and Pokémon is truly our ultimate research tool!
Your experience with Volcanion will inspire Trainers everywhere. I couldn’t be prouder, %PLAYERNAME%!
Ahoy, %PLAYERNAME%! Prepare yourself to dive into the depths of this watery habitat. I’m sure you already feel the thrill of adventure washing over you.
The true treasures in these waters aren’t gold doubloons or precious gems, but the remarkable Pokémon that call this place home.
Those twinkling lights in the distance may be the passing glow of an Inkay, or the shining tail fins of a Finneon.
Set forth to explore this habitat with the heart of an adventurer! May fortune find you, %PLAYERNAME%!

In life AND in Hyper Training, the path you take depends on your goals! Let's see where this new journey takes us.

Jalur Hadiah adalah program hadiah bulanan berupa Pelatih dapat menerima Poin Hadiah sesuai dengan pembelian yang dilakukan setiap bulan.* Dapatkan beberapa Poin Hadiah untuk meningkatkan level Jalur Hadiah dan membuka hadiah! 1. Lakukan pembelian yang sah untuk mendapatkan Poin Hadiah.* 2. Buka hadiah dengan mendapatkan Poin Hadiah. 3. Kunjungi situs web kami guna mempelajari cara menerima hadiah yang terbuka.** *Hanya pembelian yang dilakukan dengan mata uang asli yang dihitung untuk progres Jalur Hadiah. Poin Hadiah tidak dapat diperoleh dengan penukaran menggunakan PokéCoin. **Poin Hadiah akan kedaluwarsa saat akhir bulan. Meskipun Pelatih telah mengambil hadiah, Poin Hadiah tidak akan dilanjutkan ke bulan berikutnya. Pelatih yang menggunakan akun anak-anak tidak dapat berpartisipasi dalam program Jalur Hadiah. Poin Hadiah bukanlah uang tunai atau mata uang lainnya sehingga tidak dapat ditransfer ke akun lain. Ketersediaan dan kebijakan program Jalur Hadiah dapat berubah.
Untuk detail lebih lanjut, kunjungi situs web.
